content:
<@425572898787426305> had a question about this test https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/core/pyspec/eth2spec/test/electra/epoch_processing/pending_deposits/test_apply_pending_deposit.py#L288-L302

in the test, we will first run `process_registry_updates` which will initiate the validator exit because effective balance < EJECTION_BALANCE which will set `validator.exit_epoch` to some value < `FAR_FUTURE_EPOCH`.

So when we run `process_pending_deposits`, we should be postponing the deposit because `is_validator_exited == True`. However, the test expects us to apply the deposit immediately seems like.
